name: SetVehicleParamsCarWindows
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7  and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Allows you to open and close the windows of a vehicle.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to set the window state of

params_body.name: driver
params_body.description: The state of the driver's window. 0 to open, 1 to close.

params_body.name: passenger
params_body.description: The state of the passenger window. 0 to open, 1 to close.

params_body.name: backleft
params_body.description: The state of the rear left window (if available). 0 to open, 1 to close.

params_body.name: backright
params_body.description: The state of the rear right window (if available). 0 to open, 1 to close.

related_fn:
SetVehicleParamsCarDoors: Open and close the doors of a vehicle.
 GetVehicleParamsCarDoors: Retrive the current state of a vehicle's doors.
 GetVehicleParamsCarWindows: Retrive the current state of a vehicle's windows
